SEARCH
Package tetris.boards.nes

Class NESConfig

java.lang.Object
tetris.boards.nes.NESConfig
public class NESConfig extends Object
Configuration constants for NES (Classic) Tetris emulation.

This class translates the original game's frame-based values (running at approx 60.09 Hz) into values compatible with this application's update loop.

    • LOCK_DELAY_FRAMES

      public static final int LOCK_DELAY_FRAMES
      Standard entry delay / lock delay. While NES doesn't have a modern "lock delay" (it locks on impact), it has entry delays. This value approximates the feeling of the piece settling.
      See Also:
